description: A refreshing and energizing latte combining the earthy flavors of matcha with a hint of spicy ginger, served over ice and made with creamy almond milk.

steps.step: In a small bowl, combine the matcha powder and grated ginger.
Add a small amount of almond milk (about 50 ml) to the matcha-ginger mix and whisk until smooth to form a paste.
In a medium saucepan, heat the remaining almond milk over medium heat until just warm, not boiling.
Stir in the honey and vanilla extract until dissolved.
Pour the warm almond milk mixture into the bowl containing the matcha paste and whisk until well combined.
Fill four glasses with ice cubes.
Pour the iced ginger matcha latte mix over the ice in each glass evenly.
